enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Pre-registration - Reserved for Spanish Studies students.
title: WCAS SPANISH 115-2-24 Accelerated Elementary Spanish
class_attributes:
Attendance at 1st class mandatory

One Addtl hour or more TBA

Prerequisites apply, see description

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value:
For students with some previous experience in Spanish. Communicative method. Further development of speaking, listening, conversation, and grammar skills, as well as knowledge of Hispanic culture, in a cultural context.

Three class meetings a week.
Outside online video program twice a week.
Offered winter and spring.
Prerequisite: 115-1
No P/N

subject: SPANISH
